name: Golf and Run
description:
Golf and Run is a Jump and Run Game where you controll a physic based rolling Golf Ball.

This Game was made for the Kenney Jam 2019.

The game will be ported to Web / HTML soon

Controlls:

Move/Roll = WASD

Jump = Space (hold down short = small jump, hold down long = high jump)

Go back to last checkpoint = R

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
